poster: III J H i N III
title: update failed unspecified error occurred. please check the logs for more information.
body:
Thanks riot for your consideration.

here is what i've done so far :

proplem: whenever i update i get this error " calculating differences 1 file scanned " which stays like this for 5 minutes then i get this error " update failed unspecified error occurred. please check the logs for more information. Retry "

***i'm on windows 7 x64***

what i did :

1. change server = doesn't work.
2. copy S_OK file and paste it inside Projects each sub folder = doesn't work.
3. remove lol_air folder then restart lol client to update = doesn't work.
4. downloaded hextech repair tool = doesn't work.
5. used google public DNS = Doesn't work.
6. switched to another ISP = Doesn't work.
7. forwarded LOL ports = Doesn't work.
8. try to reinstall the game ( downloaded the installer and gets stuck on the same message ).

NOW WHAT ?

please riot it has been 2 days without summoner rift, i can't sleep ffs guys.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 

please post a fix or at least reply.

your attention is much appreciated.

replies.body:
I have the same problem and i think the reason is from our internet

i am from Saudi Arabia and i am connected to Zain and it failed i tried Mobily both were on Routers and its still failed I tried STC form my Iphone and it worked but i cant download the entire game from my phone because it has limited data 
I tried putting my Zain card into my phone and it did not work
also my friends who use Zain have this problem and the ones who have STC dont have it 
so i think the only ones who have this problem are Mobily and Zain useres

BTW: Zain Mobily and STC and the network companies in SA

now its clear to me!! thanks for all the player here in KSA.. im using also zain (culprit!)..  cant play league now for almost 2 months! i hope there is an update regarding this matter... someone go to ZAIN!! hahaha!

I have STC router but a Zain card is inside it and I am starting to think you are right... didn't something like this happen in Oman? League got blocked there a month ago or something I don't remember exactly.

I have the same thing as you 
But it only works for an STC card
And can u tell me what happened in Oman?
https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/58jl64/league_of_legends_is_now_blocked_in_oman/

I hava the same issue since 3 days now
client update stop always at 1 scanned file
I re-installed my Windows
re-installed the game

nothing has worked for me

I found a fix! At least for my pc. I installed the 2015 Visual C++ and then I went into Settings>Systems>Apps and Features and found the MS Visual C++ apps and modified all to repair them. I restarted my pc and tried to redo the client and it installed perfectly fine. I hope this helps you man

Tried using my phone's internet, it worked, but I can't play on my phone's internet forever(I hope I can go back to using my home internet), I also have to redownload the updates cuz i uninstalled FeelsBadMan. the ISP that wasn't working was Zain in Saudi Arabia if anyone is wondering.
same

replies.poster: III J H i N III
replies.body:
ok i found something, i installed a vpn program and for some reason the updating process worked and i finally updated the game, but when i close the vpn app and reopen the client it gives me the same " calculating diff.... " error.

am i supposed to play with a vpn app ?

This would mean the issue is along your route, since a VPN forces a rerouting of your network connection to our servers. I'd definitely recommend disabling the VPN, then running a traceroute so you'll have data to show your ISP. Grab the network app [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/), then plug **31.186.224.42** into the host field and start the trace. After 5 min has passed by, export the results as text and paste them in a reply to me.

replies.poster: III J H i N III

replies.body:
Thanks for providing this traceroute!

It shows that your latency spikes *immediately* after your connection hops outside your home network and your connection drops off after a cluster of Telia Nodes, and ends before reaching our servers at this specific Telia node:

>**internap-ic-305857-ffm-b11.c.telia.net**

Since your ISP partners with Telia (who is a backbone provider) to get your connection to our servers, you'll want to reach out to your ISP's tier 2 support and provide them this traceroute along with the context of what you're experiencing with League. This should provide them with more than enough data to launch an investigation to resolve this.

Let me know if you have any questions.

replies.poster: III J H i N III

did u fix it already?
Same issue here

mine stops at 0 or before 0 even

I also have this problem for a few days now and I haven't chosen to upgrade to the new client yet. It never reaches the point where it shows any percentage at all(at least for me, unsure of op but it sounds like he is in the same boat).
Scanning: http://prntscr.com/dafaqm
Retry: http://prntscr.com/daf8u7

I have the exact same issue, and I've sent a ticket 2 days ago and got no reply, it's always at 0%, 1 files scanned, tried all 8 things written above, and repaired C++, still the same issue. (I went to a pc bang, and a friend's house, none of them had this issue at all.)
Also, I've made sure to run as admin, disabled firewall all other known fixes etc...
I have the same issue on my Mac since two days as well!! Does anyone have a solution for Mac? {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

I am having this same exact issue. I have yet to find any fix, if only they would let you revert the client back.
Edit: I am currently running the scan and repair. So hopefully, that finds something.
